version_description:
*Add Relic item
- Check the Inventory -> Relic tab
- I gave a reward according to my highest level.

* Ruby Ad Reward changed to 15 per 30 minutes
* Increase the amount of gold purchases.
* Ruby Boost product prices down
* Equipment box price reduction

* bug fixed
- Costume MP Recovery 10 -> 20

*Add Relic item
- Check the Inventory -> Relic tab
- I gave a reward according to my highest level.

* Ruby Ad Reward changed to 15 per 30 minutes
* Increase the amount of gold purchases.
* Ruby Boost product prices down
* Equipment box price reduction

* bug fixed
- Costume MP Recovery 10 -> 20

- Set items added
- Enchant always succeeds. Enchant requires scroll and gold.
- Relic's possession limit is applied
- Higher dungeon monsters give more experience.
- When you clear a dungeon, you can replay the current dungeon.
- Set item Enchant Cost is down.
- Guardian statues always appear in deep dungeons
- We temporarily stopped supporting some languages.

- Set items added

- Set item Enchant Cost is down.
- Guardian statues always appear in deep dungeons
- We temporarily stopped supporting some languages.
